Title: The Wedding Hustler
Starring:
Chris Soriano 
 Christine S. Chang 
 Hillary Soriano 
 Heart Evangelista 
 Kane Lim
Plot: A wedding hustler helps a bride and groom throw a surprise wedding.
Cast: Christine S. Chang as The Wedding Planner
Production: Principal photography happened in locations around San Diego, California including National City, Mission Valley and Pechanga Resort & Casino. It is based on the Sorianos' own surprise wedding during the COVID-19 pandemic, which took place on the first day of production. Before she was cast, Chang was a real-life wedding planner in Southern California. Heart Evangelista and Kane Lim were also cast.
Release: The film was distributed by 1091 Pictures and was released on video on demand on February 7, 2023.
